Interface TranslationPhraseChunkerFactory


  • public interface TranslationPhraseChunkerFactory
    A factory for creating a chunker
    Author:
    John McCrae

      • getPhraseChunker

        TranslationPhraseChunker getPhraseChunker(eu.monnetproject.ontology.Ontology ontology,
                                        eu.monnetproject.lang.Language srcLang)
        Create a chunker
        Parameters:
        ontology - The ontology for semantic analysis
        srcLang - The source language
        Returns:
        The chunker or null if the chunker could not be created for the parameters
